wikipedia_page.main: Wingold Lawrence (1874–1938) was a British actor. Lawrence emerged as a prominent stage actor of the London theatre. He also enjoyed a brief film career, with leading roles in films such as Eugene Aram (1914) and Mysteries of London (1915).

response: Mysteries of London is a 1915 British silent crime film directed by A. E. Coleby and starring Wingold Lawrence and Flora Morris.Palmer p.886 The film may have taken its inspiration from the Victorian penny dreadful The Mysteries of London.
